Package org.jgrapes.core.annotation

Class HandlerDefinition.ChannelReplacements

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
java.util.HashMap<Class<? extends Channel>,Object>
org.jgrapes.core.annotation.HandlerDefinition.ChannelReplacements
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Class<? extends Channel>,Object>
Enclosing class:
HandlerDefinition
public static class HandlerDefinition.ChannelReplacements extends HashMap<Class<? extends Channel>,Object>
Represents channel (criteria) replacements that are to be applied to channels elements of Handler annotations.
See Also:
